QuestData.Title: Gurf's Dignity
QuestData.Description: You recover the piece of fur that Gurf had "lost" in his struggle with the murlocs. Return the fur to Gurf and let him know that the fearsome Murgurgula has been slain.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return Gurf's Dignity to Gurf at Stillpine Hold on Azuremyst Isle.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is that what I think it is?
QuestData.RewardText: <Gurf spits on the clump of fur and tries to affix it to the hairless patch on his backside.>$B$BThis will have to do for now! Hopefully one of the shaman will be able to repair the damage.
